person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Paul Crofts , 33 , and an accomplice were contracted to shoot a man , identified only as Tony , in the leg to punish him for his misconduct with a female friend of the contractor , the New South Wales Supreme Court was told .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Paul Crofts |
| an accomplice |
| a man named Tony |

Note: I included "a man named Tony" as a person entity because even though he is only identified as "Tony," it is still a specific person mentioned in the text.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Paul Crofts |
| an accomplice |
| a man identified only as Tony |
